body_html:
Thank you. Yes, that fixed it.
Following the instructions, I used

./configure

then

bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

and then used the following to install to python:

bash bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /Users/kevin/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages
body_text:
Thank you.  Yes, that fixed it.
Following the instructions, I used
./configure

then
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

and then used the following to install to python:
bash bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /Users/kevin/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages
body:
Thank you.  Yes, that fixed it.
Following the instructions, I used 
```
./configure
```
then
```
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```
and then used the following to install to python:
```
bash bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /Users/kevin/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages
```
